Description:
Identifies use of various commands to query a systems time. This technique may be used before executing a scheduled task or to discover the time zone of a target system.

Author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Discovery of a System Time
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\net.exe' or process_path like '%\net1.exe') and command like '%time%') or (process_path like '%\w32tm.exe' and command like '%tz%'))
